resources.string: Once your registration will be processed you will be notified by email.

In order to obtain the service from the Service Provider, with this consent I express my agreement that UAB "Ondato" will receive and manage my personal data, including my biometric data, gained from remote identification of my personal identity by taking and/or filming live image of my face, my person\'s identity or the document used to identify it and/or their image and the personal data contained in them and/or check in the population registry: image of my face, name, surname, nationality, gender, personal code, date of birth, numbers of the document that is being used, date of issue and validity, my signature and the transfer of such data to the Service Provider. I also note that I am informed that the controller of my personal data, including my biometric data, specified in this consent is the Service Provider and UAB "Ondato" will process my personal data only until the remote identification procedure is over and the results will be transferred to the Service Provider. I also declare that I am informed and agree that my personal data obtained for remote identification and its purposes may be stored by UAB "Ondato" for longer period of time than it takes for the identification to be completed or transmission of its results to the Service Provider, but only at the request of the Service Provider or UAB Ondato\'s contractual obligation to the Service Provider, but not longer than it is defined in the Contract that was signed between UAB "Ondato" and Service Provider or requested by the Service Provider. I am informed, that I can submit request regarding my personal data for more detailed information at info@ondato.com. Hereby I declare and confirm, that all the personal data I will provide for remote identification of my personal identity purpose, are correct and accurate, and the document, which I will use for this purpose is not false and valid.
To continue using this service you need to validate that you fit the websites requirements. The verification process consists of 3 steps.
2. Take a photo of your document
Choose a document and start verification
Please capture the main document page that contains MRZ zone
Please capture the front side of your ID card
Please capture the back of identity card
Please capture the front side of driving license
Please capture the back side of driving license
Make sure that the photo on the captured document is clearly visible & the data is readable. If you believe, that the image quality is acceptable, please click the \"Continue\" button
Please show the front side of your ID card in the marked area and press the button \"Capture\". Document should be clearly visible, not blurry or pixelated
Please capture the front of identity card
Please capture the back of identity card
Please show the back side of the ID card in the marked area and press the button \"Capture\". Make sure that MRZ zone is clearly visible and document is not blurry or pixelated.
Capture yourself while holding your document
Hold the document near your face while taking a selfie
Please capture the front of driver\'s licence
"Please show the front side of driving license in the marked area and press the button \"Capture\". Photo of driving license should be clearly visible, not blurry or pixelated"
Please capture the back side of driving license
Please show the back side of driving license in the marked area and press the button \"Capture\". Driving license should be clearly visible, not blurry or pixelated
Please capture the main passport page
Capture yourself while holding your document
Make sure that the photo is clear
Position your face in the middle of the frame and follow the instructions. Photo should be not blurry and evenly lit.
Please show the main document page that contains MRZ zone in the marked area and press \"Capture\". Document page should be clearly visible, not blurry or pixelated.
Failed to recognise face photo in the document
Failed to match face photo with document photo
Failed to recognise face photo in the document
Failed to match personal number in your document and registration form
Submitted Black and White copy of document
Person with such a given name is found in sanction list
Your document is recognised in Lost and Stolen database
We kindly ask you to take a selfie in a real time manner. Your face should be clearly seen, taken in a well lit environment and not blurry. Please make sure that face is clearly visible

Failed to recognise your face photo in the document. We kinldy ask to capture the document page that contains your face photo. Your document should be clearly seen, taken in a well lit environment, not blurry or pixelated. Please make sure that face photo in your document is clearly visible

MRZ zone exctraction failed. We kindly ask to capture the document page that contains MRZ zone. Your document should be clearly seen, taken in a well lit environment, not blurry or pixelated. Please make sure, that MRZ zone of your document is clearly readable

Individual in a selfie does not match with individual in a document photo. Please make sure that face photo upload format is as much identical as in document photo. Remove glasses and other accessories from your face

Failed to recognise your face photo in the document. We kindly ask to capture the document page that contains your face photo. Your document should be clearly seen, taken in a well lit environment, not blurry or pixelated. Please make sure that face photo in your document is clearly visible
Your personal number in the document did not match with the perosnal number in registration form. We kindly ask you to submit the document which information was provided in registration form

You have submitted a Black an White copy of your document. Please be informed that you must take a picture of your actual document. Your document should be clearly seen, taken in a well lit environment, not blurry or pixelated

You have submitted document photos of two different documents. Please be informed that you must capture photos of the same document. Your document should be clearly seen, taken in a well lit environment, not blurry or pixelated. Please make sure that information in your document is clearly visible
Please be informed that we have detected multiple faces during your identification. We kindly ask you to make sure that identification is performed only by the document holder
A person with your given name is found in sanction list. We will review your identification manually and inform the company about the result. This might take couple moments
Celebrity has been recognised in one of the picture you have uploaded. Please be informed that you must capture a photo of yourself and your personal document
Your document has been recognized in Lost and Stolen database. Please press "Try again" and provide another document
Your camera permissions are disabled. Tap below to edit your settings.
Raise Camera Up To Eye Level
Please Frame Your Face In\nThe Small Oval, Then The Big Oval
We kindly ask to make sure that your face is not obstructed by any items and you are not making any unusual facial expresions during identification
Please be informed that your identification was unsuccessful due to poor lighting. We kindly ask to make sure that your face is evenly lit
We kindly ask to make sure that your face fits in the marked zone properly. You must look straight into the camera
Please be informed that during your identification harsh lighting surrounding was detected around your face. We kindly ask to make sure that your surrounding is not too bright
Frame Your Face in the Oval
We need a clearer video selfie.
